name: XtremAthlon V0.0.1.0 Prototype
description:
XtremAthlon is a game about extreme speeds, precision platforming, and the use of different vehicules at a frenetic pace. You can jump from a rocket to a destruction ball, to a futuristic racing car. The game is still very early in development so only a part of the content is downloadable/playable. All levels have been unlocked for playtesting purposes but in the final version of the game, you'll have to unlock levels by finishing the previous. XtremAthlon is a game inspired by Mirror's Edge, Mario Odyssey as well as Portal, even though this inspiration is less understandable this early in development.

You can message me if you want to talk about the game, I'll be happy to answer.
